participant_1.name: Arjun
participant_1.personality: Arjun is enthusiastic and passionate about life. He enjoys engaging in deep conversations about music and technology.
participant_1.background: my favorite music genre is death metal. my family and i are from india. i'm studying to be a computer programmer. i am a swim coach at my local pool. my mother is very traditional while i prefer to be more free spirited.

participant_2.name: Sofia
participant_2.personality: Sofia is creative and nurturing, always looking for ways to express herself through art and teaching. She's outgoing but has a shy side when it comes to new interactions.
participant_2.background: i am fluent in english spanish and french. my boyfriend and i are moving into an apartment together next week. my favorite colors are red and silver. i am interested in photography and like taking pictures. i am an elementary school teacher.
